section.p: You are washed up on a narrow stretch of beach at the back of a bay surrounded by high mist-shrouded peaks.

A bottle has been swept up on to the shingle beside you. Though your fingers are trembling with cold, you manage to unscrew it. Inside you find a
ship’s deeds, which you can add to your list of possessions.

After resting to recover your strength, you pick your way up a series of steep paths until you can get a clear view of the island. To the north lies an expanse of glittering blue forest, so there can be no question where you are - Braelak, the Sorcerers’ Isle. Nearer at hand is a tower built of obsidian blocks.
